lyrics:
6 contributorssnake mountain blues lyricsmr ten dollar man let me tell where youre bound
drink your green liquor lord you roll to the ground
well you come around here with your money in your hand
tasting my woman well you die where you stand

well the snake mountain blues got me down low
i could die in the morning aint no one would know
well my woman she come around my body shed find
go down in dundee and have her a time

well my daddy lord he rides on a long holy train
the first winds of winter ill see him again
and its fare well to this yellowheaded misery ive known
snake mountains calling calling me home

well the snake mountain blues got me down low
and i could die in the morning aint no one would know
well my woman she come around my body shed find
go down to dundee and have her a time
have her a timesee colter wall liveget tickets as low as 68you might also likeembed
